page.title: 10Leisure survey
page.content: Rangers 1% |Looking after Pathfinders 1% |children 33% Brownies 2% |Cricket 35% Judo 3% |Disco 38% Scouts 4% |Cooking 39% Cubs 5% |Looking after 45% Skateboarding 6% |pets Karate 9% |Group games 45% Church 11% |Football 48% Horse -riding 11% |Rollerskating 48% Guides 13% |Helping mum 53% Sunday school 16% |Library 57% Fishing 18% |Bike riding 60% Dancing 19% |Drawing 63% Model Making 21% |Leisure centre 65% Sewing 22% |Reading 74% Youth Club 23% |Swimming 83% Netball 26% |Playing with 97% Gardening 29% |friends Snooker 30% | {Survey of 141 10/11 year old children {from 4 schools in area.
